short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One-click download of images and videos from Etsy, supporting both individual file and full file packaging download.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
One-click download of images and videos from Etsy™, supporting both individual file and full file packaging download.

# Features

- Supports multiple image sizes
- Download images and videos from Etsy™ products.
- One-click download for all images and videos, conveniently saved in a zip file.

# How to use?

- Open any Etsy™ product page.
- Click on the Chrome extension app.
- The first option is to click on the download icon of the image or video to download the respective file.
- The second option is to click "Download All" to download all image and video files. Allow the process to finish, and the images and videos will be automatically downloaded in a ZIP file.

# **Is it Free?**

Indeed, Etsy™ Downloade is available for free. You can access the basic features and choose to upgrade for more functionalities.

# **Data Privacy**

All data processing occurs locally on your computer, and it never traverses our servers.

# **Disclaimer**

Etsy™ is a trademark owned by Etsy™ Inc. Etsy™ Downloader  has no affiliation, endorsement, sponsorship, or direct relation to Etsy™, Inc., its affiliates, or subsidiaries.
